channel.title: 2 Quick Questions
channel.description:
Ok, i'm using Wolf's BlitzPk source, and i'm having a few problems.
No, i am not the best coder in the world, but I am not a PServer newb.
The two things i would like to ask, is: 1) Where do i put cases? I know exactly what do with cases, and have wrote a good 70 on my old server, but when i look for anything that is around the cases i have wrote on my old server, they are not there. EG: case 299:, /*OBJECT CLICK ONE*/, public void objectClick.
2) How do i lower the experiance rate of combat skills?
Thanks in advance, Smitty/Bo0m

item.title: 2 Quick Questions
item.dc:creator: @Il_Range_Il Il Range Il
item.description:
@Il_Range_Il wrote:

Ok, i’m using Wolf’s BlitzPk source, and i’m having a few problems.

No, i am not the best coder in the world, but I am not a PServer newb.

The two things i would like to ask, is:

  1. Where do i put cases? I know exactly what do with cases, and have wrote a good 70 on my old server, but when i look for anything that is around the cases i have wrote on my old server, they are not there.
    EG: case 299:, /OBJECT CLICK ONE/, public void objectClick.

  2. How do i lower the experiance rate of combat skills?

Thanks in advance,
Smitty/Bo0m
